data.title: Vintage Movie Posters
data.meta_description: Shop for-and learn about-Vintage Movie Posters. Vintage movie posters are highly collectible, especially those for films released before the 1940s. Few of...
data.text: Vintage movie posters are highly collectible, especially those for films released before the 1940s. Few of these early posters survived because theater owners were obliged to send them along to the next theater. A smaller variant of the poster, the lobby card (or window card), is more widely available because theaters were allowed to add their names to the cards and keep them. Beginning in the 1940s, theaters were able to buy additional...Continue Reading
